name: CE-5
description:
Sometimes running from something brings you closer instead.

You've left your home and everything you've ever known behind for the city life for a reason unknown even to yourself. What does your new home hold for you?

CE-5 is a first-person visual novel exploring events surrounding a group of people at a communal complex in the city.

Average Run Time: 30-35 minutes

Endings: 3

Known Bugs: Some computers freeze at one specific part of the game randomly. Rebooting the game corrects this.

Developer Notes:

Thank you for taking the time to click on my page, examine my game, and hopefully play it.

This is my first attempt at a game of any sort along with my first use of TyranoBuilder.

I'd love feedback and if there is any interest in further episodes of this title as I'm debating continuing it after the Game Jam.

Please let me know via page comment, Twitter or e-mail.

Again, many thanks for the interest!
